panels.visual: Visual: Inside the maze - walls of shimmering crystal that reflect Lightsword's image a thousand times. Some reflections look normal, others... wrong. Colored lights pulse through the crystal. Location: Maze of Echoes entrance Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "The Maze of Echoes. Illusions, traps, and somewhere deeper... crying."

characters.Lightsword: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light No defined species - ethereal and mysterious Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form

panels.visual: Visual: A corridor with glowing tiles - red, green, blue, gold - shifting constantly. Detect Magic card glows as Lightsword sees which are safe. Location: Maze - shifting floor Characters: Lightsword
panels.dialogue: Lightsword: "Detect Magic... there. The bright ones are safe."

panels.visual: Visual: Three paths - left, right, middle. Lightsword uses Detect Magic + Telekinesis (rolling a NATURAL 20!). Their eyes BLAZE with power as they see through ALL illusions! Location: Maze - illusion walls Characters: Lightsword
